Label: Specification description
Description: If Specification details and features do not adequately specify the body of the product, a short text description may be added to give a more detailed specification. The field is optional, and repeatable to provide parallel specifications in multiple languages. The language attribute is optional for a single instance of <SpecificationDescription>, but must be included in each instance if <SpecificationDescription> is repeated to provide parallel descriptions in multiple languages.
Format: <dd>Variable length text, suggested maximum length 500 characters</dd>
Example: <x564>With die-cut in outer bottom corner of leaves</x564>
